description:
This third race will decide who stands dominate, Setouchi or Suruga. Kawai and Rokudou have beat out their opponents, and now Setouchi has an advantage, 4-to-2. Nozomi is also slowly driving Maya into a corner, but right when she thinks she`s won, suddenly Nozomi is blown back by a fierce attack. Just what happened, and will Setouchi really be able to start a new chapter in history for themselves?
Source: crunchyroll
